maqras.text: agar (ab bhi) ye munafiq aur jin ke dilo mein bimaari hai aur wo log jo madine mein ghalath afwaahe udaane waale hai, baaz na aaye to hum aap ko un (ki tabaahi) par musallath kar denge, phir to wo chandh din hee aap ke saath is shahar mein reh sakenge
un par phitkaar barsaayi gayi, jahaan bhi mil jaaye pakde jaaye aur qoob tukde tukde kar diye jaye
un se aglo mein bhi Allah ka yahi dastoor jaari raha aur tu Allah ke dastoor mein har giz raddu badal na payega
log aap se qayaamath ke baare mein sawaal karte hai, aap keh dijiye! ke us ka ilm to Allah hee ko hai, aap ko kya qabar bahuth mumkin hai qayaamath bilkul hee qareeb ho
Allah ta’ala ne kaafiro par laanath ki hai aur un ke liye bhadakti hoyi aag tayyaar kar rakhi hai
jis mein wo hamesha hamesha rahenge, wo koyi haami wa madadgaar na payenge
us din un ke chehre aag mein ulat pulat kiye jayenge (hasrath wa afsoos se) kahenge ke kaash hum Allah ta’ala aur rasool ki ita’ath karte
aur kahenge aye hamaare rab! hum ne apne sardaaro aur apne bado ki maani, jinhone hamein raahe raasth se bhatka diya
parvardigaar tu unhe dogna azaab de aur un par bahuth badi laanath naazil farma
aye imaan waalo un logo! jaise na ban jaao, jinhone Mosa(alaihissalaam) ko takleef di, pas jo baath unhone kahi thi, Allah ne unhe us se bari farma diya, aur wo Allah ke nazdeek ba izzath thein
aye imaan waalo! Allah ta’ala se daro aur sidhi sidhi (sacchi) batein kiya karo
ta ke Allah ta’ala tumhaare kaam sawaar de aur tumhaare gunaah maaf farma de aur jo bhi Allah aur us ke rasool ki taabedaari karega, us ne badi muraadh pa li

hum ne apni amaanath ko asmaano par zameen par aur pahaado par pesh kiya, lekin sab ne us ke uthaane se inkaar kar diya aur us se dar gaye (magar) insaan ne ose utha liya, wo bada hee zaalim jaahel hai
(ye is liye) ke Allah ta’ala munaafiq mardo, aurto aur mushrik mardo aurto ko saza de aur momin mardo aurto ki tauba qubool farmaaye, aur Allah ta’ala bada hee baqshne waala aur meherbaan hai

tamaam tarife us Allah ke liye saza-waar hai, jis ki milkiyath mein wo sab kuch hai, jo asmaano aur zameen mein hai, aaqirath mein bhi tareef osi ke liye hai, wo (badi) hikmato waala aur (pura) qabardaar hai
jo zameen mein jaaye aur jo us se nikle, jo asmaan se utre aur jo chad kar us mein jaaye, wo sab se ba qabar hai, aur wo meherbaan nihaayath baqshish waala hai

kuffaar kehte hai ke hum par qayaamath nahi ayegi, aap(sallallahu alaihi wasallam) keh dijiye! ke mujhe mere rab ki qasam! jo aalimul ghayb hai, ke wo yaqinan tum par ayegi, Allah ta’ala se ek zarre ke baraabar ki cheez bhi pushida nahi, na asmaano mein aur na zameen mein, balke us se bhi chohti aur badi, har cheez khuli kitaab mein maujoodh hai
ta ke wo imaan waalo aur neko-kaaro ko bhala badhla ata farmaaye, yahi log hai jin ke liye maghfirath aur izzath ki rozi hai
aur hamaari aayato ko nicha dikhaane ki jinhone koshish ki hai, ye wo log hai jin ke liye badh tareen qism ka dardnaak azaab hai
aur jinhe ilm hai wo dekh lenge ke jo kuch aap ki jaanib aap ke rab ki taraf se naazil hoa hai, wo (saraasar) haq hai aur Allah ghaalib qoobiyo waale ki raah ki rehbari karta hai
aur kaafiro ne kaha (aao) hum tumhe ek aisa shaqs batlaaye jo tumhe ye qabar pahoncha raha hai, ke jab tum bilkul hee reza reza ho jaoge, to tum phir se ek nayi paydayish mein aoge

(hum nahi keh sakte) ke khud us ne (hee) Allah par jhoot baandh liya hai ya ose diwaangi hai, balke (haqiqath ye hai) ke aaqirath par yaqeen na rakhne waale hee azaab mein aur door ki gumraahi mein hai

kya pas wo apne aage piche asmaan wa zameen ko dekh nahi rahe hai? agar hum chaahe to unhe zameen mein dhasa de ya un par asmaan ke tukde gira de, yaqinan us mein puri daleel hai, har us bandhe ke liye jo (dil se) mutawajjeh ho
